name: Animated Puzzle - Free fun for all puzzle lovers
name_original: Animated Puzzle - Free fun for all puzzle lovers
description:
Animated Puzzle: is unique addictive live animated puzzle game.
Simply touch a tile to move it and try to solve the puzzle!
Enjoy this animated slide puzzle games for FREE!
The coolest thing is that every piece of the puzzle is live and you must assemble the animation!

FEATURES:
• Animated pictures that you should arrange into one picture
• Simple rules and Easy control
• Various stages with awesome animations
• Hours of fun exciting gaming
